description: Variation of Conditions 6 (BREEAM) and 8 (Energy) of P101995 for the development to achieve BREEAM offices rating no less than ‘very good’ with reasonable endeavours to achieve ‘excellent’ and the use of gas fire boilers instead of CHP.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

A461-001; BA/2207.01.211Rev.F; Brukl Output Document – Dated 29 January 2014, Energy Performance Certificate – Ref. 0770-0334-8119-0602-4006, PV Information – RNR Solar dated 12/09/1012, BREEAM Report – 06 March 2014, Email sent 12 February 2014 from David Etherington Waterstone Design – Building Services Consultants, Letter dated 14 August 2014 from Darragh Collins – Ben Adams Architects; Email from Paul Kemkaran- Thompson Sent 14 August 2014; District heating Scheme Schematic Rev.P1, Fresh Air/ Vent Schematic RevP1; E130401A, E130401;  Email sent 12:47 21 August 2014 from Darragh Collins – Ben Adams Architects; D1923 (80)-1(--)001Rev.P2 – Basement Plant Room Layout (Attached to email sent 12:47 21 August 2014 from Darragh Collins – Ben Adams Architects); D1923 (80)-1(--)001Rev.P2 – Basement Pant Room Layout, D1923 (80)-1(--)001Rev.P2 Plant Room Schematic, D1923 (80)-1(--)001Rev.P2 E130401A(Attached to email sent 11:38 21 August 2014 from Darragh Collins – Ben Adams Architects); Manufucture’s details – Wall-hung gas condensing boilers Quinta Pro 30 – 45 -65 – 90 – 115 (Ref. 12357-AF Design & Access Statement August 2010, Rev A ref: 2207.01 dated 23/3/11; Visual Structural Report, project no. DS/02 dated June 2010; Mechanical Services Ventilation Strategy Statement, ref: 68631; Heritage Statement; Mini-CHP Carbon Saving Microgeneration Technology; Planning Statement, ref: 1098 dated November 2010; Transport Statement and Travel Plan, ref: 1098 dated November 2010; Sustainable and Design Construction Statement ref: ESS/SP&SA/140910-RT dated November 2010 including: Air Quality Screening Assessment, BREEAM 2008 Pre-Assessment dated 05/11/2010, Environmental Noise Assessment, DEFRA Background Emissions Data, Department for Transport Prescribed Processes, and Tempro Traffic Growth Factors; BA/2207.01/201; 202 RC; 203; 204; 205; 206; 207; 208; 209; FCG3-01C; 02D; 03D; 04D; 05D; 06E; 07G; 08F; 09F; 10B; 11D; 13A; FCG/3/12B; BA/2207.01/210C; 211D; 212D; 213D; 214D; 215E; 216A; 217; 217A; and 218B.

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
